post.description:
<!-- theme: warning -->
> ðŸ“˜ **Scopes required**:
> - quote:write

This endpoint will allow you to generate a quote for a Direct property. The quote includes all the financials and a link to our booking flow allowing you to redirect the user to complete the booking.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the property to get a quote for.

guest_details.description: The details of the primary guest

promo_code.description: A promo code to apply to the quote

booking_url.description: The url to initiate the guest booking flow.

taxes.description: All the taxes applicable to the quote.

fees.description: All the fees applicable to the quote.

discounts.description: Any discounts applicable to the quote.

sub_total.description: The total price of the quote. This is the accommodation + fees + taxes - discounts.

total_fees.description: The combined total price of the fees for the quote.

total.description: The total price of the quote. This is the accommodation + fees + taxes - discounts.

total_without_taxes.description: The total price of the quote without taxes. This is the accommodation + fees - discounts.

__errors__.#/components/schemas/400: No foreign doc with id components found

get.description:
> ðŸ“˜ **Available includes**:
> 
> - guest
> - user
> - financials (required: `financials:read` scope)
> - listings (required: `listing:read` scope)  
> - properties (required: `property:read` scope)
> - review (required: `reviews:read` scope)

<!-- theme: warning -->
> We will default to reservations with check-in dates in the next 2 weeks if at least one of these query parameters are not provided:
> - `start_date`
> - `end_date`
> - `date_query`

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number you would like to retrieve

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to include per page.

parameters.name: properties[]
parameters.description: Array of property UUIDs to query for.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Find reservations with check-in/check-out dates after this day.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Find reservations with check-in/check-out dates before this day.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated values, any of: financials,financialsV2,guest,properties,listings

parameters.name: date_query
parameters.description: Configure whether to use your date values to search by 'checkin' or 'checkout'.

parameters.name: platform_id
parameters.description: Find reservations with a reservation code that exactly matches the one given

parameters.name: conversation_id
parameters.description: Find reservations with a conversation id that exactly matches the one given

parameters.name: last_message_at
parameters.description: Find reservations where the last message is after the specified datetime

post.description:
<!-- theme: warning -->
> ðŸ“˜ **Scopes required:**
> 
> - message:write
> Please write to team-platform@hospitable.com in order to get this scope added to your token.


> â—ï¸ **Rate Limits**: 
> - Only 2 messages per minute can be sent to a single reservation
> - Only 50 messages can be sent every 5 minutes

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the reservation

body.description:
Text body of the message to send. Note:
- HTML is not supported.
- `/n` is parsed for line breaks.

images.description:
The URL location of any images to attach to the message.

- Maximum of 3 images.
- The maximum filesize is 5MB.

post.description:
<!-- theme: warning -->
> ðŸ“˜ **Scopes required:**
> 
> - message:write
> Please write to team-platform@hospitable.com in order to get this scope added to your token.


> â—ï¸ **Rate Limits**: 
> - Only 2 messages per minute can be sent to a single inquiry
> - Only 50 messages can be sent every 5 minutes

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: This is the conversation_id.

body.description:
Text body of the message to send. Note:
- HTML is not supported.
- `/n` is parsed for line breaks.

images.description:
The URL location of any images to attach to the message.

- Maximum of 3 images.
- The maximum filesize is 5MB.
- Airbnb does not support attachments on Inquries!

400.description: Booking.com inquiries don't always allow messaging. See [Booking.com's Partner Hub article on pre-booking messaging](https://partner.booking.com/en-us/hosts/pre-booking-messaging).

examples: Messaging is not enabled for this Booking.com thread.
Messaging is not enabled for this Booking.com thread.

410.description: Once an Inquiry has become a Reservation you will need to use the reservation endpoint to message it

examples: This Inquiry is now a Reservation and can be retrieved by the Reservation API. See the location header.

location.description: The location of the reservation api for the new reservation

get.description:
<!-- theme: warning -->
Returns a paginated list of reviews that guests have left for a specific property. Currently, we source review data from Airbnb and our own direct bookings.


<!-- theme: none -->
>ðŸ“˜ Required scopes:
> - reviews:read

<!-- theme: none -->
> ðŸ“˜ Available includes:
> 
> - guest 
> - reservations

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of results

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of results per page

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated values, any of: guest

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the property

post.description:
<!-- theme: warning -->
Response to a review received for a reservation.

<!-- theme: none -->
>ðŸ“˜ Required scopes:
> - reviews:write

403.description:
If the review can not be responded to because:

- It has already been responsed to.
- The review has not been responded to within the response window.

Bearer-Authorization.description: Enter the token with the `Bearer ` prefix, e.g. `Bearer abcde12345`

x-stoplight.errorMessage: This object is set as internal and excluded.
This object is set as internal and excluded.
This object is set as internal and excluded.

check-in.description: The default checkin time for the property.

check-out.description: The default checkout time for the property.

platform_id.description: This is the listing id used on the platform.

calendar_restricted.description: If a property is `calendar_restricted` its calendar will not be able to be updated using the Update Property Calendar endpoint

parent_child.description: If the property is in a Parent/Child setup then this will contain all the information about that relationship.

type.description: If this property is the parent or child in the relationship.

parent.description: If this property is a child, this is the parent property id.

children.description: If this property is a parent, this is any child property ids

siblings.description: If this property is a child, this is any sibling property ids. These are other child properties of this properties parent.

examples: 100% refund 24 hours after booking accepted, if booking is requested at least 24 hours before check-in

grace_period.description: Grace period in hours on missed payments before cancelling a booking

guests_included.description: The number of guests included in the base fee.

extra_guest_fee.description: The fee for any guests above the guests_included.

pet_fee.description: The fee per pet; does not include service animals

fees.description: All fees that will be applied to a booking

discounts.description: Discounts that could be applied to a booking

cancellation: 100% refund 24 hours after booking accepted, if booking is requested at least 24 hours before check-in

arrival_date.description: This provides only the date, not the exact check-in time. Refer to check_in.

departure_date.description: This provides only the date, not the exact check-out time. Refer to check_out.

category.description: The overall status of the reservation

sub_category.description: The status of the reservation within a category

total_price.description: The total amount paid by the guest

accommodation_breakdown.description: A breakdown of the price of each night of the reservation

revenue.description: The total revenue of the reservation after service fees

examples: Great place we will be back!
So happy you enjoyed it so much!
The cabin was cozy and comfy.
